Making An Ad For A $99 Website

Today I made this advertisment for an offer of a business website for just $99.

The Offer Includes

Free Domain: Most Domains Can Cost From a Few Dollars to a Couple with this deal you’ll get a free unique domain that fits your business goals.

Free Server Space: Server space can cost you a few dollars every month and about a couple hundred a year. With this package you won’t have to worry about that additional cost.

(3 - 5) Custom Pages: With your free domain and server space you’ll also get 3 - 5 custom pages built exactly to your specificity.

Fonts I Used

For the font I used Kumar One & Karla
